description: Choi Jadoo is the main character of Hello Jadoo. She is the eldest child/daughter of her family. She has a tomboyish personality and a known to be a troublemaker. She doesn`t like people bossing her around, telling her what to do and she doesn`t like people judging her. Jadoo loves playing outdoors activity and dislikes doing her homework. She can also be very understanding and caring.
name: Choi Jadoo
